entry.title: The Forgotten Night
entry.summary:
Author: Chromedove

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,151Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 44

Summary: Scopaesthesia: the feeling of being watched when no one is there.Buck has been having that feeling lately... That he was being watched. His hairs on his neck would raise, a tingling sensation, being uncomfortable. He had no proof so he thought he was being paranoid.A night out, intended to loosen him up, shows him that maybe there was someone there the entire time.This work is going to have multiple chapters, I selected the box for it but it seems to not want to listen and is posting it as a one shot... It's not. Sorry about that!

entry.title: Blue Pink White Pink Blue
entry.summary:
Author: Warlock_Nerd

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,195Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 172

Summary: Bobby noticed him first and went up to him. "Can I help you, young man?"The teenager shuffled forward. "I'm looking for Edmundo, Edmundo Diaz? He works here."Hearing his name, Eddie's brow furrowed. He stepped closer. At first, he didn't recognize the face. The sharp shape of the jaw, the curve of the mouth‚Ä¶ then it clicked."Rachel?" He called, a question laced with surprise.The teenager straightened, "I go by Raphael now."***Eddie gets an unexpected visitor one day on shift, it‚Äôs his little cousin who needs a place to stay after getting kicked out by his parents :3¬†Just so everything is clear. This happens in an alternate universe where season 8 happened a lot differently. Bobby is alive and well, Eddie and Chris never went to Texas, the whole Kim Marisol thing never happened and Buck lives with Eddie due to the loft disappearing or something. (Shh. Don‚Äôt read too much into it.)Chris is 14.Enjoy :3

entry.title: Where You Go, I Go

Author: Lil4cz

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,877Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 123

We need all the personnel we can get-""Over my dead body." Eddie spits the words out as if it were poison."Diaz, you do not make orders here." Dalton says."If he's going, I'm going." entry.title: Never Let Me Go ( A Sinner Like Me)
entry.summary:
Author: colescharms

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 148,808Chapters: 35/?Kudos: 272

Summary: When infamous rockstar Evan ‚ÄúBuck‚Äù Buckley gets injured (again), his label hires Army vet-turned-EMT Eddie Diaz to shadow him on tour. Eddie‚Äôs job is simple: keep Buck breathing. But nothing about Buck is simple‚Äînot his smile, not his secrets, and definitely not the way he starts to feel like home.Eddie‚Äôs supposed to keep Buck safe. Buck‚Äôs supposed to stay out of trouble. But somewhere between motel parking lots, midnight emergency calls, and songs that sound too much like confessions, lines blur‚Äîand hearts get caught in the wreckage.This tour might save Buck‚Äôs career. It might ruin Eddie‚Äôs life. Or maybe, if they‚Äôre lucky, it could be the start of something louder than either of them expected.

entry.title: I Didn‚Äôt Mean to Be Something I‚Äôm Not Supposed To, but I Am. I Am.
entry.summary:
Author: schrijverr

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,982Chapters: 5/23Kudos: 200

Summary: After everything Buck and Eddie have gone through together, the marriage that was once just convenience is now real. They‚Äôre boyfriend-husbands, trying to figure out what their life looks like now that they‚Äôre dating and learning to be an actual couple.However, trouble arises with the promised trip back home to El Paso for the summer. Eddie is not ready to come out to his parents and Buck supports him in that. Still, El Paso is not the place where either of them have been their best and tensions arise between them when having to exist in the influence sphere of the Diaz parents. Everything that has happened between them catches up as personal histories, insecurities and unresolved issues float back up to the surface.¬†AKA: The terrible, horrible, no good, very bad El Paso trip where Buck and Eddie's marriage of convenience has become a secret relationship instead.

entry.title: Keep Me (In the Pocket of your Jeans)
entry.summary:
Author: Pxrpls

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 135,970Chapters: 19/?Kudos: 460

Summary: That‚Äôs his problem. Buck always manages to make the calls personal, even if they are so far behind his realm of reality. He always makes them about himself, he had been told this way too many times already. And he‚Äôs trying to change, he really is. But then there are moments like these in which a little girl needs saving and Buck blurs the line between what‚Äôs his job and his own need to be there for everyone he meets. His need to fix everything. ¬† So he stays there, just for that first surgery he keeps reminding himself, just to make sure she makes it out of the ER. Just to make sure Hen is right and she is in good hands. And a few hours later, when she makes it out and the doctor‚Äôs look around the waiting room for Cassie‚Äôs parents without all the context Buck already has, he stands up. On instinct. Barely even a lie. He couldn‚Äôt count it as one when he hadn‚Äôt spoken at all. He just stands up. He stands up and he follows the doctor to the ICU. In which Buck worries about the little girl he just saved from a fire, and he gives her a home in his arms.

entry.title: Westbound
entry.summary:
Author: MidnightDraft

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 33,438Chapters: 14/18Kudos: 16

Summary: Right after the season 8 finale, Buck leaves Los Angeles for Santa Monica. Choosing a new home, new friends, and finally, himself. Eddie doesn‚Äôt understand why Buck pulled away, and the silence drives him to the edge. But feelings don‚Äôt disappear with distance, and eventually, Eddie has to face what he's been avoiding all along. What follows is his clumsy, heartfelt attempt to win Buck back.or...Buck accepts his feelings and moves away, leaving Eddie confused and realizing what he‚Äôs lost. Now, Eddie must find a way to win Buck back.

entry.title: Between his hand - Part. 1 - Attraction
entry.summary:
Author: 911_by_Jane

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,366Chapters: 3/5Kudos: 38

Summary: The contact of a glance, the burn of a touch, and... a dangerous game that pushes them a little closer to each other.After being abandoned by his girlfriend who ran off to Europe, Buck tries to piece himself back together. His broken heart no longer knows who to trust.When he saves the life of a child and his grandmother, he has no idea that this heroic act will change his own life. Because the child‚Äôs father, Eddie Diaz, isn‚Äôt like other men. Rich, charismatic, unpredictable‚Ä¶ just one look from him is enough to shake all of Buck‚Äôs certainty.Buck has never been the type to submit. But in Eddie‚Äôs arms, another side of him wakes up‚Äîa side he didn‚Äôt even know existed.Until he discovers that the man who unsettles him, challenges him, and makes him come like no one else‚Ä¶ is also the one who runs one of Los Angeles‚Äôs most powerful companies.And that their story might be more than just a game.I'm not very good to English, so please forgive any mistakes I didn't spot (there may be a lot.)

entry.title: All the Signs I Missed
entry.summary:
Author: IdoGeek

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,256Chapters: 11/13Kudos: 294

Summary: It‚Äôs not a whisper, not exactly. It‚Äôs just‚Ä¶ matter-of-fact. Like saying it out loud isn‚Äôt the hard part. Like waiting for a reaction is.The words drop between them, sudden and small, but precise.Eddie blinks, caught mid-step.‚ÄúWhat?‚ÄùBuck searches his face. Something subtle shifts behind his eyes. ‚ÄúWait‚Ä¶ you didn‚Äôt know?‚ÄùThere‚Äôs no accusation in it. Just confusion. Like it never occurred to him that Eddie wouldn‚Äôt know.Eddie stares, his brain a beat behind his body. ‚ÄúNo, I‚ÄîI didn‚Äôt.‚Äù¬†OR¬†Buck is trans and out. So out, that most people don't think about it anymore. So when Eddie joins the 118, no one mentions it. The question is, how long will it be, until Eddie finds out?¬†finished and will be updated daily

entry.title: This Is How It Ends (Every Time)
entry.summary:
Author: Silveraura

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,464Chapters: 4/5Kudos: 19

Summary: Buck loves him like a bruise that never fades. It sits under the surface and aches whenever he breathes too close.Eddie lives behind walls he cannot name, too afraid of what might happen if he lets the truth in and the denial out.One night, Buck speaks the words Eddie has spent years avoiding. The air does not ignite, but something shifts. Something cracks.Now they are standing in the ruins of what they never had the courage to build.They are not lovers.They are not only friends.They are something unbearable in between.
